ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Mistmoore and unrest?
ygData.msgSnippet: Unrest was really good for me from 26 thru 31.  Rest of the group was same or 1 level higher.  Bard, Ench or Necro, SK, War, Clr, Druid.  Around 25 we did the
ygData.messageBody:
Unrest was really good for me from 26 thru 31. Rest of the group was same
or 1 level higher. Bard, Ench or Necro, SK, War, Clr, Druid. Around 25 we
did the Bar room (2nd floor), then 27 or so (which was 2 or 3 nights later)
we moved to the Knight room (3rd floor.) In our low 30's we did the
basement torture chamber. Around mid 30, we did the Ghost room with a
higher level druid who wolfed us. Then we moved on.

Iirc, I would use the Lullaby song for crowd control in the Bar and Knight
room when we needed it. Our ench was trading off between her Ench and her
Necro. In the house, you can attack things on the 3rd floor from the second
floor. You see the particle effects from 3rd floor fights all the time when
in the bar room. And you can target and attack thru the floor. Also, the
agro ranges over-lap. Our rule of thumb for either room was both needed to
be camped to hold the one you were in. So, we paid attention to the 'other
room' and were prepared to evac if they left or were chased out.

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Minstrel somewhere on Innoruuk...
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Bill Costlow" <atlatyl@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 12, 2000 9:33 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Mistmoore and unrest?


> Having recently hit lvl 29, I left the Lake and FM
> zones for Mistmoore...
>
> dying six times in two days and a lvl lower, my party,
> in the same boat, has voted to hit Unrest, thinking we
> might have better luck there. (any suggestions on
> hunting in Mistmoore? ... the alcove and graveyard
> proved disasterous for my party lvls 22-29)
>
> Questions: If I am singing DDD on the second floor of
> the House in Unrest, will I be pulling mobs on other
> floors?
>
> What part of Unrest is good for a mid/high 20s group?
>
> Thanks to all,
>
> Tyunes
> Climbing back to 29th lvl
